alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Clay; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 9:47PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Alachua, northern Marion, northwestern Putnam and southern Clay Counties through 1045 PM EST... At 947 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from Lake Geneva to near Williston Municipal Airport. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Melrose, Fort McCoy, Citra, Hawthorne, Sparr, Florahome, Melrose Landing, Cross Creek and Orange Springs. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Clay; Western Marion; Western Putnam
